Description:
HeadLine : Near Onetahuti Bay

Location : When you stay at Awaroa Lodge in Awaroa Bay, you ll be in a national park and 7 minutes by foot from Abel Tasman National Park. This 4-star hotel is 4.6 mi (7.4 km) from Totaranui Beach and 11.2 mi (18.1 km) from Tata Beach.

Rooms : Make yourself at home in one of the 26 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators. Rooms have private patios. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.

Dining : Enjoy a meal at the restaurant or snacks in the coffee shop/cafe. The hotel also offers room service (during limited hours). Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. Cooked-to-order breakfasts are available daily from 7:30 AM to 10 AM for a fee.

Renovations : The property is closed between May 1 and September 30.

Description:
Both cottages at this property are nestled in the heart of a small, premium wine vineyard, offering privacy and stunning water views. Kina Beach Vineyard Cottages are self-contained with 1-bedroom and 1 bathroom each.

Each cottage at Kina Beach Vineyard has a dining area, kitchen, BBQ facilities and access to both free WiFi and private parking. A complimentary bottle of Kina Beach Vineyard wine is provided.

The vineyard is situated almost exactly halfway between Nelson City and Abel Tasman National Park. Idyllic Kina beach is just a 5-minute walk through the vineyard and the Kina Cliffs Golf Course is 2 km away.

Complimentary tea and Nespresso coffee.

Breakfast inclusive rate: breakfast hamper with locally sourced and organically grown provisions for a self-prepared continental breakfast. Includes milk, orange juice, home-made bread, butter, preserves, muesli, yoghurt, locally grown fruit and free range eggs.

Dogs are allowed by enquiry at the Old Schoolhouse only, contact the property before booking. Please inform Kina Beach Vineyard Cottages in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), please ensure that you are only booking this property following the local government guidelines of the destination, including but not limited to the purpose of travel, and maximum allowed group size.

Description:
This beautiful, self-catering cottage is situated on a half acre garden, filled with roses, peonies, lavenders, fruit trees, a large vegetable garden and abundant bird life. The cottage has its own entrance and driveway, well separated from the main house, for privacy.

The garden at Tasman Village Cottage has been developed over 20 years and includes Cape Cod chairs, outdoor tables, benches and umbrellas as well as a gas BBQ and grill for outdoor meals on the verandah.

The Great Taste Cycle Trail runs past Tasman Village Cottages door, ideally situated for those who want to enjoy the trail. The Abel Tasman National Park, Neslon Lakes and Kahurangi National Park are all within an hours drive of the property. Please inform Tasman Village Cottage in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
Managed by a private host

Situated in Kina Beach in the Tasman Region, DUrville House Seaside Escape features self-catering accommodation with a patio and free WiFi. The 4-star apartment features sea views and is 41 km from Nelson.

The apartment has 1 bedroom, a TV and a fully equipped kitchen.

Guests can relax in the garden at the property.

Motueka is 9 km from DUrville House Seaside Escape, while Kaiteriteri is 27 km away. Nelson Airport is 37 km from the property. Description:
Ahipara Holiday Park features an outdoor seating area with free gas barbecues, plus a large lounge and dining area with fireplace and a satellite TV. Guests have access to shared kitchen and laundry facilities.

Facilities at Ahipara Holiday Park Northland include a childrens playground, table tennis, board games and DVD hire. Free Wi-Fi is available at the Holiday Park.

Guests have a choice of private accommodation with en suite bathroom or dormitory rooms. Studios and apartments with cooking facilities are available.

The tour desk can organise local activities including quad biking on Ninety Mile Beach, 4-wheel-drive tours, horse treks and surfing. Sufboard and bicycle hire are available. Kaitaia Golf Course is located next door. Kaitaia town centre is 15 km away. Guests arriving outside reception opening hours are kindly requested to inform the hotel in advance. Contact details can be found on the booking confirmation.

Please note the reception opening hours are: 08:00 until 19:00 hours between May and October; and 08:00 until 21:00 hours between November and April.

Please note for bookings of 10 or more guests, different policies and procedures may apply. For further information please contact the property in advance, using the contact details found on the booking confirmation.

Description: Ocean Vista Ahipara is conveniently located in the popular Ahipara area. The property features a wide range of facilities to make your stay a pleasant experience. Facilities like free Wi-Fi in all rooms, private check in/check out, kitchen, family room, BBQ facilities are readily available for you to enjoy. Closet, complimentary tea, towels, carpeting, complimentary instant coffee can be found in selected guestrooms. Enjoy the hotel''s recreational facilities, including hiking trails, surfing lessons, golf course (within 3 km), fishing, horse riding, before retiring to your room for a well-deserved rest. For reliable service and professional staff, Ocean Vista Ahipara caters to your needs.

Description:
Endless Summer Lodge offers idyllic beachfront accommodation in a historic 1870s villa. Guests can relax in the hammocks, or enjoy a walk along 90 Mile Beach.

You can prepare a meal on the BBQ facilities, using fresh herbs from the garden. Guests have access to a communal kitchen and shared bathroom facilities. Surfboard hire available.
Accommodation options include private rooms with sea views, and shared rooms. Please inform Endless Summer Lodge in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Please note that there is a 3% charge when you pay with a credit or debit card.

Description:
Boasting a bar and a restaurant, Ahipara Bay Motel is situated in Ahipara and features panoramic views up 90 Mile Beach. All rooms feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom. Some units at the property have a balcony with a sea view.

At the hotel, rooms include a wardrobe. Rooms come with a kettle, while some rooms include a kitchen with a stovetop. All rooms will provide guests with a microwave.

Kaitaia is 14 km from Ahipara Bay Motel. Bay of Islands Airport is 98 km away.

Description:
Located in Ahipara and only 3 km from Ninety Mile Beach, Casa Del Mar provides accommodation with mountain views, free WiFi and free private parking. With garden views, this accommodation features a balcony.

The holiday home with a terrace and sea views features 3 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a fridge and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the holiday home.

A barbecue is available on site and hiking can be enjoyed within close proximity of the holiday home.

The nearest airport is Kaitaia Airport, 23 km from Casa Del Mar. Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.

Description:
Boasting sea views, The Huts offers accommodation with a garden and a balcony, around 600 metres from Shipwreck Bay Beach. Featuring free private parking, the bed and breakfast is in an area where guests can engage in activities such as windsurfing and fishing.

The bed and breakfast also has a well-equipped kitchenette with a fridge, a stovetop and a toaster, as well as free toiletries.

Breakfast is available every morning, and includes continental, vegetarian and vegan options.

A barbecue is available for guests at the bed and breakfast to use.

The nearest airport is Kaitaia Airport, 24 km from The Huts. Managed by a private host

Description: The Olive Grove is just an hour from Christchurch and is the perfect place to relax, indulge, explore and experience the uniqueness of the beautiful Banks Peninsula. Your hosts Chris and Annette will welcome you to The Olive Grove which is located in Robinsons Bay, just 5 minutes from the historic and picturesque village of Akaroa with its shops, restaurants and cafes. Set in an established garden and working olive grove, the original home was built in 1915 and extensively restored in 2014. Traditional features such as pressed zinc ceilings and leadlight windows were retained. Guests enjoy spectacular harbour views from their balcony, bed and bathroom.

Description:
Providing city views, Beaufort House Akaroa in Akaroa provides accommodation, a garden, a shared lounge and a terrace. Both WiFi and private parking are available at the bed and breakfast free of charge.

There is a private bathroom with shower in all units, along with free toiletries and a hairdryer.

Guests at Beaufort House Akaroa can enjoy a Full English/Irish breakfast.

Akaroa Beach is less than 1 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Christchurch International Airport, 84 km from Beaufort House Akaroa. Description:
Overlooking Akaroas Main Wharf, Bruce Waterfront Apartments offer a private balcony with lovely harbour and bay views. All apartments feature full kitchen and laundry facilities.

Bruce Waterfront Apartments Akaroa are 5 minutes walk from Stanley Park, and 10 minutes walk from the Akaroa Museum (Te Whare Toanga). Christchurch International Airport is 90 km away.

The apartments have a spacious living room with satellite TV and a DVD player. Each apartment has underfloor heating, and a bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries.

The tour desk can book local activities including swimming with dolphins, penguin watching and harbour cruises. Free parking is available on site. In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.
If you expect to arrive outside reception opening hours, please inform Bruce Waterfront Apartments in advance, using the contact details found on the booking confirmation.

Please note that the reception desk for Bruce Waterfront Apartments is located 50 metres away at Tresori Motor Lodge, on the corner of Rue Jolie and Church Street. Please contact the property in advance for further details, using the contact details found on the booking confirmation.

Description:
Located in the historic French village of Akaroa, this property offers self-contained accommodation with a patio, a balcony and free on-site parking. Guests can enjoy swimming, fishing, biking and kayaking just metres from Akaroa Waterfront Motels.

Situated in the Canterbury region of the South Island, Akaroa Waterfront Motels is surrounded by lovely gardens and offers spectacular harbour views. It is 8 minutes walk from Akaroa Harbour where you may be able to spot Hectors Dolphins.

Guests enjoy unlimited free WiFi. There is a private on-site boat ramp and spacious lawn and picnic areas shaded with palm trees.

All accommodation includes a kitchenette, a dining area and a work desk. Each apartment offers a lounge area with a sofa, flat-screen TV with over 50 satellite channels and a DVD player. Please inform Akaroa Waterfront Motels in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
From 15 May 2021 until 15 October 2021, office hours are 9.30am until 6.30pm, late check is available but must be confirmed at least 12hours prior arrival.

You can request your preferred bedding configuration in the Special Requests Box at the time of booking. Please note that the bedding configuration is not guaranteed and will be confirmed upon arrival, subject to availability.

Please note that Akaroa Waterfront Motels does not accept payments with American Express credit cards.

Description:
Property Location
Located in Akaroa, Chateau Mont Clair is in a rural location and convenient to Linton and Akaroa Museum. This 4-star bed & breakfast is within close proximity of Artisans Gallery and Akaroa Wharf.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 2 guestrooms featuring refrigerators and flat-screen televisions. Rooms have private patios. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a terrace and a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access. Getting to nearby attractions is a breeze with the complimentary area shuttle that operates within 3.00 km.

Dining
Mingle with other guests at a complimentary reception, held daily. A complimentary full breakfast is served daily.

Business, Other Amenities
A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and free self parking is available onsite.

Description:
Offering free WiFi, Banks House Akaroa is just 5 minutes walk from Akaroa Waterfront. Set amongst manicured floral gardens, this historic property offers harbour views.

Banks House is 7 minutes walk from both Akaroa Wharf and Akaroa Lighthouse. It is 15 minutes walk from the Pohatu Penguin Habitat. Christchurch City Centre is a 1-hour and 30-minute drive away.

This tranquil guest house is set in a restored building from 1877, and furnished with European antiques. Guests have access to a shared lounge area with a TV. Some rooms offer sea views. Towels and linen are provided.

Description:
Offering an outdoor pool, a tennis court, a fitness centre and a day spa, Annandale Coastal Farm Escape & Luxury Villa Collection is located in Akaroa. All accommodation offers a patio, a fully equipped kitchen and free onsite parking.

Annandale Coastal Farm Escape & Luxury Villa Collection is 36 km from Christchurch International Airport.

An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including cycling and hiking. Guests have free access to bicycles to explore the area.

Annandale Coastal Farm Escape & Luxury Villa Collection can be reached via helicopter. Please inform Annandale Coastal Farm Escape & Luxury Villa Collection in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.

Description: This lovely resort is set in Akaroa. This accommodation does not operate a 24-hour reception. This accommodation does not accept pets.

Description: Chez Fleurs Bed & Breakfast Akaroa accommodation is a short 3 minute walk away from Akaroa's waterfront, restaurants, cafes, shops, galleries and many other local attractions.
HotelFacilities: Hotel Hairdryer Balcony Laundry service

Description:
The Villa Akaroa - Akaroa Pet Friendly Holiday Home offers accommodation in Akaroa, 200 metres from Akaroa Beach. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property and private parking is available on site.

The holiday home is equipped with 2 bedrooms, a kitchen with fridge and oven, and 2 bathrooms with a shower, a hairdryer and a washing machine. A TV, as well as an iPod docking station are offered.

Guests at the holiday home can enjoy golfing and fishing nearby, or make the most of the garden.

The nearest airport is Christchurch International Airport, 85 km from The Villa Akaroa - Akaroa Pet Friendly Holiday Home. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
All guests must sign the propertys Terms of Stay prior to arrival
HotelFacilities: Beach wifi available in all areas Private parking parking on site Air conditioning Non-smoking throughout Free WiFi wifi internet services Fishing Garden Golf course (within 3 km) Pets allowed Parking

Description:
Blythcliffe features a garden and a terrace in Akaroa. The Stables features a kitchen and all rooms have a private bathroom. Both free WiFi and private parking are available at the bed and breakfast.

The stables include a coffee maching as well as a TV and all rooms feature a seating area. The accommodation provides some units with sea views, and every room includes tea and coffee making facilities. Guest rooms have a wardrobe.

Blythcliffe offers a continental or vegetarian breakfast.

Christchurch is 41 km from the bed and breakfast, while Lincoln is 43 km from the property. The nearest airport is Christchurch International Airport, 49 km from the property. Please inform Blythcliffe in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
Please note that there is a 3% charge when you pay with a credit card.

Description:
Boasting a seasonal outdoor pool, Twin Gullies in Akaroa features accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking for guests who drive.

There is a private bathroom with shower in all units, along with free toiletries and a hairdryer.

A continental, vegetarian or vegan breakfast can be enjoyed at the property.

Guests at the bed and breakfast can enjoy hiking nearby, or make the most of the garden.

The nearest airport is Christchurch International Airport, 74 km from Twin Gullies. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
Please inform Twin Gullies in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Managed by a private host

Description:
Offering a sun terrace and views of the mountain, French Bay House is set in Akaroa. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property and free private parking is available on site.

Certain units include a seating area to relax in after a busy day. Each room has a private bathroom equipped with a shower. For your comfort, you will find bathrobes and free toiletries.

There is a shared lounge at the property.

A selection of activities are offered in the area, such as cycling and hiking. Christchurch is 75 km from French Bay House, while Lincoln is 43 km from the property. The nearest airport is Christchurch International Airport, 87 km from French Bay House. Please inform French Bay House in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
